name: Z-machine Package Game File
summary: Learn about .ZBLORB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ZBLORB files are similar to .BLORB files but are compatible with only Z-machines. They are the same as .ZLB files. BLORB files containing Glulx games will most likely appear with the ".gblorb" or .GLB extensions.

description: Z-machine game file used by Interactive Fiction (IF) interpreters such as Zoom and Spatterlight; contains the story contents in a Blorb wrapper which enables inclusion of other gameplay files, such as .AIFF files for sound effects and .MOD files for music.
